languages.text: Блюстители, передают, что судно сбито более крупным кораблем. Опытные офицеры утверждают, что попадания по корпусу сделаны удивительно аккуратно, будто преследователь стремился не повредить какой-то ценный груз внутри. Кто бы это ни был, перед падением капитану судна удалось завести машину в глубокую расселину и скрыть от врага место своей гибели.

The enforcers report that the craft was downed by a larger ship. Seasoned officers note the amazing precision of the hits on the hull, as if the pursuer was trying to avoid damaging some valuable cargo inside. Whoever they were, the craft's captain was able to steer it into a deep crevasse just before the crash, thus hiding the location of the wreckage from the enemy.

languages.text: Die Enforcers berichten, dass das Schiff von einem größeren Schiff abgeschossen wurde. Erfahrene Offiziere erwähnen die erstaunliche Präzision der Treffer am Rumpf, als habe der Verfolger vermeiden wollen, irgendeine wertvolle Fracht im Inneren zu beschädigen. Wer sie auch waren, der Captain des Schiffs konnte es kurz vor dem Aufprall in eine tiefe Spalte steuern und so die Position des Wracks vor dem Feind verbergen.
languages.original_text: The enforcers report that the craft was downed by a larger ship. Seasoned officers note the amazing precision of the hits on the hull, as if the pursuer was trying to avoid damaging some valuable cargo inside. Whoever they were, the craft's captain was able to steer it into a deep crevasse just before the crash, thus hiding the location of the wreckage from the enemy.

traits.locale_text: Die Enforcers berichten, dass das Schiff von einem größeren Schiff abgeschossen wurde. Erfahrene Offiziere erwähnen die erstaunliche Präzision der Treffer am Rumpf, als habe der Verfolger vermeiden wollen, irgendeine wertvolle Fracht im Inneren zu beschädigen. Wer sie auch waren, der Captain des Schiffs konnte es kurz vor dem Aufprall in eine tiefe Spalte steuern und so die Position des Wracks vor dem Feind verbergen.

languages.text: Selon les prévôts, l'appareil aurait été attaqué par un vaisseau plus imposant. Des officiers chevronnés remarquent la précision remarquable du tir qui a abattu l'appareil, comme si les assaillants souhaitaient épargner sa précieuse cargaison. Visiblement, le capitaine a été capable de mener l'engin dans une crevasse profonde avant de s'écraser, dissimulant ainsi l'épave à ses ennemis.
languages.original_text: The enforcers report that the craft was downed by a larger ship. Seasoned officers note the amazing precision of the hits on the hull, as if the pursuer was trying to avoid damaging some valuable cargo inside. Whoever they were, the craft's captain was able to steer it into a deep crevasse just before the crash, thus hiding the location of the wreckage from the enemy.

traits.locale_text: Selon les prévôts, l'appareil aurait été attaqué par un vaisseau plus imposant. Des officiers chevronnés remarquent la précision remarquable du tir qui a abattu l'appareil, comme si les assaillants souhaitaient épargner sa précieuse cargaison. Visiblement, le capitaine a été capable de mener l'engin dans une crevasse profonde avant de s'écraser, dissimulant ainsi l'épave à ses ennemis.

languages.text: 执法者报告说，这艘舰船是被一艘更大的舰船击坠的。经验丰富的军官注意到，这艘舰船的舰体遭受了精准打击，袭击者似乎刻意避免损坏舰船内部的贵重货物。这艘船的舰长在坠毁之前，驾驶它冲入了深邃的裂隙之中，不让敌人找到舰船残骸的所在。
languages.original_text: The enforcers report that the craft was downed by a larger ship. Seasoned officers note the amazing precision of the hits on the hull, as if the pursuer was trying to avoid damaging some valuable cargo inside. Whoever they were, the craft's captain was able to steer it into a deep crevasse just before the crash, thus hiding the location of the wreckage from the enemy.

traits.locale_text: 执法者报告说，这艘舰船是被一艘更大的舰船击坠的。经验丰富的军官注意到，这艘舰船的舰体遭受了精准打击，袭击者似乎刻意避免损坏舰船内部的贵重货物。这艘船的舰长在坠毁之前，驾驶它冲入了深邃的裂隙之中，不让敌人找到舰船残骸的所在。

languages.text: Los guardias informan de que la nave fue derribada por otra más grande. Los oficiales veteranos remarcan la precisión excelente de los disparos en su casco, como si su perseguidor hubiera intentado evitar daños a la mercancía valiosa que contenía. Fuera quien fuera, el capitán consiguió conducir la nave a una profunda grieta antes del impacto, ocultándola así frente a sus enemigos.
languages.original_text: The enforcers report that the craft was downed by a larger ship. Seasoned officers note the amazing precision of the hits on the hull, as if the pursuer was trying to avoid damaging some valuable cargo inside. Whoever they were, the craft's captain was able to steer it into a deep crevasse just before the crash, thus hiding the location of the wreckage from the enemy.

traits.locale_text: Los guardias informan de que la nave fue derribada por otra más grande. Los oficiales veteranos remarcan la precisión excelente de los disparos en su casco, como si su perseguidor hubiera intentado evitar daños a la mercancía valiosa que contenía. Fuera quien fuera, el capitán consiguió conducir la nave a una profunda grieta antes del impacto, ocultándola así frente a sus enemigos.

languages.text: 執行官たちは、その船が更に大きな他の船に撃墜されたと報告している。経験豊富な士官たちは、船体への攻撃の精密さに驚愕している。まるで内部の貴重な積荷を損傷させないように注意していたかのようだ。彼らが何者であろうと、その船の船長は墜落直前に操縦して、深い割れ目に機体の残骸を敵から隠した。
languages.original_text: The enforcers report that the craft was downed by a larger ship. Seasoned officers note the amazing precision of the hits on the hull, as if the pursuer was trying to avoid damaging some valuable cargo inside. Whoever they were, the craft's captain was able to steer it into a deep crevasse just before the crash, thus hiding the location of the wreckage from the enemy.

traits.locale_text: 執行官たちは、その船が更に大きな他の船に撃墜されたと報告している。経験豊富な士官たちは、船体への攻撃の精密さに驚愕している。まるで内部の貴重な積荷を損傷させないように注意していたかのようだ。彼らが何者であろうと、その船の船長は墜落直前に操縦して、深い割れ目に機体の残骸を敵から隠した。

languages.text: İnfazcılar, bu geminin daha büyük bir gemi tarafından batırıldığını bildiriyor. Deneyimli subayların, geminin gövdesine isabet eden atışların olağanüstü hassasiyetini fark ediyor ve gemiye, sanki içindeki değerli yükleri hasarsız şekilde ele geçirmek istercesine atışlar yapıldığını bildiriyor. Bunlar her kimse, geminin kaptanı çarpışmadan hemen önce gemiyi derin bir yarığa yönlendirerek enkazın konumunu düşmandan gizlemeyi başarmış.
languages.original_text: The enforcers report that the craft was downed by a larger ship. Seasoned officers note the amazing precision of the hits on the hull, as if the pursuer was trying to avoid damaging some valuable cargo inside. Whoever they were, the craft's captain was able to steer it into a deep crevasse just before the crash, thus hiding the location of the wreckage from the enemy.
